  • Constructor Details

    • SantoriniGUI

      public SantoriniGUI​(ClientGUI clientGUI)
      Simply call the createAndStartGUI, to associate a GUI to the Client

      For the lobby phaseGUI consist of a main frame, with various panels that will be switched to support user interactions ( choose of name, color, card)

      For the normal game GUI consist in a main frame, with various element, such as buttons, to support user interaction showing an Image of Current state of the Board

      Parameters:
      clientGUI - the Client associated to the GUI
      See Also:
      createAndStartGUI()

  • Method Details

    • sendNotification

      public void sendNotification​(java.lang.String s)
      Send the player input from the GUI, converted in String, to the asyncWriteToSocket
      Parameters:
      s - String to send
      See Also:
      ClientGUI

    • createAndStartGUI

      public void createAndStartGUI()
      Sett the various setting for the main framework Resolution: 1920x1080

    • addBackgroundImage

      private void addBackgroundImage()
      Add a background image; This will be shown only in the Lobby phase

    • playSound

      private javax.sound.sampled.Clip playSound​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Add a background sound, which is played in loop
      Parameters:
      fileName - Name of the sound file
      Returns:
      Clip associated to the sound specified in the parameter

    • setCursor

      private void setCursor()
      Set a customized cursor to the replace the standard SO cursor

    • switchPanel

      private void switchPanel​(javax.swing.JPanel panel)
      Method to remove the current panel, and show a new one passed as parameter; This also add the settings panel to the new panel

      This is meant for the Lobby phase to switch from various panels (choose of card, color...)

      Parameters:
      panel - The Jpanel that need to be shown

    • createSettingsPanel

      private javax.swing.JPanel createSettingsPanel()
      Add a setting panel in the top right of frame, to allow user quit the game, sett or disable sounds
      Returns:
      The panel just created

    • addSettingsPanel

      private void addSettingsPanel()
      Add the setting panel to the main frame

    • removeSettingsPanel

      private void removeSettingsPanel()
      Remove the setting panel from the framework

    • addLabel

      private void addLabel​(java.lang.String pathname)
      Create a JPanel and add a label to it. Also set the JPanel to Opaque to not cover the main Panel
      Parameters:
      pathname - Relative path of the image to be added in the JLabel

    • updateGUILobby

      public void updateGUILobby​(MessageToGUI message)
      For the Lobby Phase:

      It create and remove various panels, associated to the current StateOfGUI, that need to be shown to the User. For example show the panel for InsertName, ChoseColor

      Parameters:
      message - Contains the current StateOfGui plus various info, to show available colors,card...
      See Also:
      MessageToGUI, StateOfGUI

    • updatePanelForQuiteAndLose

      protected void updatePanelForQuiteAndLose​(java.lang.String message)
      Show a panel in case a player Lose or Quit the Game
      Parameters:
      message - Message to show

    • updateMatchMessage

      protected void updateMatchMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Update the message show in the bottom of the GamePanel, to let the User know what to do
      Parameters:
      message - Message that need to be shown
      See Also:
      GamePanel

    • updatePanelForQuitLobby

      protected void updatePanelForQuitLobby()

    • updateBoard

      protected void updateBoard​(Board board)
      Update the current image of the Board to show to the User effect of his and other player's moves
      Parameters:
      board - A cloned Board, with all relative informations
      See Also:
      Board

    • updateWin

      public void updateWin​(boolean winORlose)
      Show a Panel, with relative sound effect, to User in case he Win or Lose the Game
      Parameters:
      winORlose - true if a Player win; false if a player Lose

    • updateSuperPlayer

      protected void updateSuperPlayer​(MessageToGUI message)
      Show the various custom panels associated to the Cards, to let the User choose if use his card's Super Power or Not
      Parameters:
      message - Contains info to know card chosen by User in order to show the associated Panel

    • superPlayerChoose

      protected void superPlayerChoose​(boolean response)
      Call the updateMatchMessage to let User know after his choice of use his Card's Superpower or Not
      Parameters:
      response - true if User choose to use his Card's Superpower; false otherwise

    • loadImage

      protected java.awt.Image loadImage​(java.lang.String imageName)
      load image
      Parameters:
      imageName - name of image to without extension
      Returns:
      loaded image

    • loadSound

      protected javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream loadSound​(java.lang.String soundName)
